resources.string: Any codes that this application identifies must be taken as an advisory only. You should always consult a mechanical garage about faults with your vehicle before taking any action. This application is to be used as a guide only. You must therefore agree to this in order to use this feature.

Harrison OBD Scanner 
 Author: Stuart Harrison - S0907581 

This application is to be used with Bluetooth and a adapter to connect to your cars ECU in order to get live data from a running vehicle, or to get any fault codes the ECU has stored. This app was created as coursework for the mobile and ubiquitous computing modue at the Glasgow Caledonian University.
The device you are using either does not support Bluetooth, or you have bluetooth turned off.
The device is not currently connected to the internet.
The device you are using either does not support GPS, or you have your location services disabled. Please turn this feature on to use this function.
No Updates available at this time
